claw.tatsu.xcodeml.exception

Class IllegalDirectiveException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • claw.tatsu.xcodeml.exception.IllegalDirectiveException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class IllegalDirectiveException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception thrown during the analysis of a directive.
    Author:
    clementval
    See Also:
